survey_name: Professional Development Needs for Marketing Teams Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to identify the professional development needs and preferences of marketing professionals to tailor training programs effectively.

questions.question_text: Which of the following areas do you feel you need the most professional development in?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple areas. Ensure options cover common marketing roles.

script.question_text: Which of the following areas do you feel you need the most professional development in?

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format. Consider adding a follow-up question for those who select 'Rarely or Never'.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in professional development activities?

questions.question_text: What is the primary barrier to your participation in professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an 'Other' option for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the primary barrier to your participation in professional development activities?

questions.question_text: Which format do you prefer for professional development activities?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple preferences.

script.question_text: Which format do you prefer for professional development activities?

questions.question_text: What topics would you like to see covered in future professional development programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What topics would you like to see covered in future professional development programs?
